attributes.action: Prevent any restirctions being placed on alcohol.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is designed to emphasise that placing more tax and regualtions on alcohol will not solve any drink related problems, it will only harm responsible drinkers in the UK.

The majority of people can drink responsibly in the UK and we want to defend our right to consume alchoholice beverages.

rejection.details: Please add your house number and street.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
